title: Ensemble Programming
description: A group of three or more people, with the roles Typist, Navigator, Ensemble.

title: Strong Typist Ensemble
description: A group of three or more people, with the role Typist, where the Typist types only when instructed clearly by the mob.

title: Dictatorship Ensemble
description:
A group of three or more people, with the role Typist, where the Typist types only when instructed by a navigator.

The ensemble can only help, if directly encouraged by the navigator.

title: Strong Style Ensemble
description: A group of three or more people, with the role Typist, where the Typist types only when instructed by a navigator.

title: Pair Programming
description: A pair of two people, with the role Typist.

title: Strong Style Pairing
description: A pair of two people, with the role Typist and a Navigator. The Navigator can always ask the Typist for ideas.
